snippet: Fans at next year's World Cup and this year's Confederations Cup in Russia will need special identity cards before they can watch matches, soccer's governing body said Thursday....

headline.main: World Cup Fans Will Need Special Identity Cards for Matches
headline.print_headline: World Cup Fans Will Need Special Identity Cards for Matches

lead_paragraph: Fans at next year's World Cup and this year's Confederations Cup in Russia will need special identity cards before they can watch matches, soccer's governing body said Thursday.
